column4: Hello, I'm new to Ubuntu, and I installed it on a Vmware, but I can't figure out how to install the vmware tools, could anyone help me please?
Flannel : I have already those tools on my desktop, but I don't know how could I install them
Flannel : 2 files, with these extensions .rpm and .gz
untar the tar.gz and run the install script
and I think I should install it from the terminal
yes from a terminal in that vm
: ok, how can I use it, when I type the command in the terminal, it says that this directory doesn't exist
how to determine the directory of that file?
cd to the dir and run ./app
: I extracted that folder on the desktop, its name is vmtools
ok dns53, I'm going to try this
